pesticide.PPE: Natural rubber is chemical resistant to Protect LESCO® Mancozeb DF T&O Fungicide. If you want more options, follow the instructions for category A on an EPA chemical-resistance category selection chart. Mixers, loaders, applicators, and other handlers must wear: Long-sleeved shirt, Long pants, Shoes and socks, and Chemical-resistant gloves (except pilots). See engineering controls for additional requirements.

Active_Ingredients.name: Mancozeb
Active_Ingredients.mode_Of_Action: A coordination product of Zinc Ion and Manganese Ethylenebisdithiocarbamate

Safety_Information.general_Info: Caution. Harmful if absorbed through skin. Causes moderate eye irritation. Harmful if swallowed. Avoid contact with skin, eyes or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco or using the toilet. Remove and wash contaminated clothing before reuse.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes; remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye; call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice; have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow; do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by the poison control center or doctor; do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing; rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes; call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: In case of emergency call your local poison center or doctor; have the product container or label with you when calling; for 24 hour emergency assistance, call Chemtrec 1-800-424-9300.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 19.2 lbs active ingredient (25.6 lbs product) per acre per season
16.8 lbs active ingredient (22.4 lbs product) per acre per crop
6.4 lbs active ingredient (8.5 lbs product) per acre per season
